name: After The Storm (KrisET)
description:
Strange things begin to happen after a large storm strikes an island off the coast of New England. As residents of your small town begin to disappear, it's up to you to uncover the Eldrich forces lurking within.

Average Playtime: 1.5 Hours

Created in 2017 by Kris and Kurtis Theorin

This was the first draft of the game, so please excuse any typos or other minor issues that may arise.
